dataAccessLayer

Class ReaderHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • dataAccessLayer.ReaderHelper

  • public class ReaderHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Ben-Malik TCHAMALAM This class is responsible for providing necessary methods when fetching or saving Users, Candidates and Companies.
